full_text:
Re: Fwd: Client Jeffrey Epstein (Out of the Office)
From [redacted]
To [redacted]
Date 2019/08/06 15:25
Subject: Re: Fwd: Client Jeffrey Epstein (Out of the Office)

I will be out of the office August 5, 2019 to August 9, 2019. Counselor [redacted] will be acting in my capacity August 5, 2019. He can be reached at ext. [redacted]. Case Manager [redacted] will be acting in my capacity from August 6,2019 - August 9, 2019 and can be reached at ext. [redacted].

Please extend the usual courtesies.

Thank you,
[redacted] 08/06/19 15:25

Good afternoon all,

Below please find complaints from Epstein's attorneys. Can you check to see if he has toilet paper and that his CPAP is plugged in?
[redacted]

Thank you,
[redacted]
Supervisory Staff Attorney
CLC New York
Metropolitan Correctional Center
150 Park Row
New York, New York 10007
p: (646)836-[redacted]
f: (646)836-7665

[b)(6). (b)(7)(C) 8/6/2019 3:20 PM

Good afternoon Mr. [redacted],

Our client, Jeffrey Epstein, has informed us that he has no toilet paper in his cell. His CPap machine was not plugged in last night, so he was unable to use it.

Also, since his arrival at MCC, he has only been able to make two fifteen minute phone calls. Both times, the calls were on speaker phone, with officers present.

Page 3663
DOJ-OGR-00023855
